statements: SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM student_records;
SELECT student_name, attendance_records FROM student_records WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_records WHERE attendance_records < 10;
SELECT student_name FROM student_records WHERE grade = 70;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade, attendance_records FROM student_records WHERE grade BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
SELECT * FROM student_records WHERE grade > 70 ORDER BY student_name ASC, grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade, attendance_records FROM student_records WHERE grade BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_records WHERE attendance_records < 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_records WHERE grade < 50 OR attendance_records > 20 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, attendance_records FROM student_records WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY attendance_records DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM StudentGrades;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(record_id) AS attendance_count FROM AttendanceRecords GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 5;
SELECT student_id, MAX(date) AS latest_attendance_date FROM AttendanceRecords GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_id, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, AVG(grade) as average_grade FROM StudentGrades GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT student_name, date, status FROM AttendanceRecords WHERE status = 'present' ORDER BY date DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_id, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade < 70 OR grade > 95 ORDER BY course_id, grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE gender = 'F'
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3
SELECT student_id, course_id, attendance_status FROM student_records WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_records WHERE attendance_status = 'P'
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit >= 3;
SELECT student_id, SUM(grade) AS total_grade FROM student_records GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_grade >= 50;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_records ON students.student_id = student_records.student_id JOIN courses ON student_records.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM student_records WHERE attendance_status = 'P' AND grade > 90 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth, major FROM Student ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, department FROM Course WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_name, grade_value, semester FROM Student JOIN Grade ON Student.student_id = Grade.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM Student JOIN Attendance ON Student.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Student ORDER BY student_name ASC, date_of_birth DESC
SELECT student_name, gender FROM Student WHERE gender = 'Male' AND major = 'Computer Science'
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, department FROM Course WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name
SELECT student_name, grade_value, semester FROM Student INNER JOIN Grade ON Student.student_id = Grade.student_id
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM Student JOIN Attendance ON Student.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE is_present = TRUE
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM Courses WHERE schedule LIKE '%PM';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE first_name ILIKE 'J%';
SELECT grade_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth < '1999-01-01';

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name, g.grade FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE g.grade >= 80;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS total_courses FROM Enrollments;
